title: Boop
blurb: Conceal your emotions while your opponent does questionable things to your face. Played on Magic Leap One / iPhone X.

team.name: Brenda Chen
team.about: I collaborated to design the game, build the IPhone AR app, create the art assets, and animate.

content_html:
Inspiration

Social multiplayer games IRL.

What it does

iPhone player conceals his / her emotions while the Magic Leap player throws and drops objects (eggs, steaks, flip flops, etc.) on them to make them laugh. The Magic Leap player can also change what the iPhone player looks like, all in an attempt to make the iPhone player break his / her straight face.

How we built it

Unity, C#, ARKit, Magic Leap SDK

Challenges we ran into

Ensuring that the Magic Leap One, iPhone XR, and computer(s) running the game are able to talk to each other seamlessly.

Accomplishments that we're proud of

Our silly visual style and interactions.

What we learned

Scoping down and how to work with new hardware (Magic Leap).

What's next for Boop

More polish!

RV Requirements

Main work area, Sixth Floor. Made with Unity, C#, ARKit, Magic Leap SDK, LeanTween. All other assets in project are original.
